data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Napoli, Marcelo Felgueiras, Juncá, Flora Acuña (2006): A new species of the Bokermannohyla circumdata group (Amphibia: Anura: Hylidae) from Chapada Diamantina, State of Bahia, Brazil. Zootaxa 1244: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172905
